Posts.Content: Hi Judith and everyone here  Thanks for explaining how to find the forum.  Sorry I havent been on for a few days but trying to get on as normal and spent a couple of nights in Edinburgh and got back today. I was told to buy a sports bra and found the best ones in premark  Asdas also do post op bras.  On the Breast cancer thread there are peole at the same stage as you I havent been on today to see if youve found them  I posted your post on there and saw a few replies have a look if you find it lol. I know you will get lots of suport on here like I have had.  And wishing you all the best with your op. Take care Lots of love Lorraine
Posts.Title: new

Posts.Content: Hi Akpede If you click on the Breast Cancer thread on the left there are lots of people that will suport and advise you.  I will copy and paste your post there.  Please come and join us we are a very nice bunch.  Take care and fingers crossed you get good results. Lorraine xxx
